p: After one week of acclimatization the rats were randomly divided into 4 groups of 8 animals in each group. Group I and Group II were selected to be negative and positive control respectively and received normal saline of 2 ml/kg body weight through oral route. Group III & IV animals administered with EA 50 & 25 mg/kg p.o. respectively. Experimental rats received both the treatment doses for 60 days. One hour following each treatment all groups were subjected for lead acetate (60 mg/kg) p.o. treatment daily for 60 months with exception of the negative control [ 17].
